entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
